Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier raised bridge near Merchandise Mart. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier raised bridge near Merchandise Mart.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #124 Navy Pier Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Lower Randolph/Michigan
ShortDescription: Eastbound 124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Upper Wacker, Lower Wacker, Lower Lake Shore Dr and Illinois, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Upper Wacker, Lower Wacker, Lower Lake Shore Dr and Illinois, due to street blockage near Lower Randolph/Michigan.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
